function.name: files_ls
function.description: List files for a given path. Returns file names with directory names ending in "/".  The root ("/") is actually just ".".  To count the number of files instead of list them, set "count" to true.  To include hidden files in the list or count, set "all" to true.

reasoning.description: Step by step reasoning why this function was called and what it is trying to achieve.  This is working space for clarifying thought and is not passed through to the function

path.description: the relative path to the directory you want to list

count.description: count the number of files and return this instead of the names of the files

all.description: include all files including hidden files in the operation

function.name: files_write
function.description: Write to a file with optional contents.  Will overwrite existing files.  Will create all required parent directories. Returns the number of characters written in the operation

reasoning.description: Step by step reasoning why this function was called and what it is trying to achieve.  This is working space for clarifying thought and is not passed through to the function

path.description: the relative path to the file

content.description: the contents of the file to be written
